entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. High minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
